name: ClopenUpperSet.mk.inj
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
toClopens✝ : TopologicalSpace.Clopens α
upper'✝ : IsUpperSet toClopens✝.carrier
toClopens : TopologicalSpace.Clopens α
upper' : IsUpperSet toClopens.carrier
x✝ : Eq { toClopens := toClopens✝, upper' := upper'✝ } { toClopens := toClopens, upper' := upper' }
⊢ Eq toClopens✝ toClopens
decl:
/-- The type of clopen upper sets of a topological space. -/
structure ClopenUpperSet (α : Type*) [TopologicalSpace α] [LE α] extends Clopens α where
  upper' : IsUpperSet carrier

name: ClopenUpperSet.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : LE α
inst✝ : SizeOf α
toClopens : TopologicalSpace.Clopens α
upper' : IsUpperSet toClopens.carrier
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { toClopens := toClopens, upper' := upper' }) (HAdd.hAdd 1 (SizeOf.sizeOf toClopens))
decl:
/-- The type of clopen upper sets of a topological space. -/
structure ClopenUpperSet (α : Type*) [TopologicalSpace α] [LE α] extends Clopens α where
  upper' : IsUpperSet carrier

name: ClopenUpperSet.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
toClopens✝ : TopologicalSpace.Clopens α
upper'✝ : IsUpperSet toClopens✝.carrier
toClopens : TopologicalSpace.Clopens α
upper' : IsUpperSet toClopens.carrier
⊢ Eq (Eq { toClopens := toClopens✝, upper' := upper'✝ } { toClopens := toClopens, upper' := upper' }) (Eq toClopens✝ toClopens)
decl:
/-- The type of clopen upper sets of a topological space. -/
structure ClopenUpperSet (α : Type*) [TopologicalSpace α] [LE α] extends Clopens α where
  upper' : IsUpperSet carrier

name: ClopenUpperSet.upper'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
self : ClopenUpperSet α
⊢ IsUpperSet self.carrier
decl:
/-- The type of clopen upper sets of a topological space. -/
structure ClopenUpperSet (α : Type*) [TopologicalSpace α] [LE α] extends Clopens α where
  upper' : IsUpperSet carrier

name: ClopenUpperSet.upper
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s : ClopenUpperSet α
⊢ IsUpperSet ↑s
decl:
theorem upper (s : ClopenUpperSet α) : IsUpperSet (s : Set α) :=
  s.upper'

name: ClopenUpperSet.isClopen
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s : ClopenUpperSet α
⊢ IsClopen ↑s
decl:
theorem isClopen (s : ClopenUpperSet α) : IsClopen (s : Set α) :=
  s.isClopen'

name: ClopenUpperSet.coe_toUpperSet
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s : ClopenUpperSet α
⊢ Eq ↑s.toUpperSet ↑s
decl:
/-- Reinterpret an upper clopen as an upper set. -/
@[simps]
def toUpperSet (s : ClopenUpperSet α) : UpperSet α :=
  ⟨s, s.upper⟩

name: ClopenUpperSet.ext_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s t : ClopenUpperSet α
⊢ Iff (Eq s t) (Eq ↑s ↑t)
decl:
@[ext]
protected theorem ext {s t : ClopenUpperSet α} (h : (s : Set α) = t) : s = t :=
  SetLike.ext' h

name: ClopenUpperSet.ext
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s t : ClopenUpperSet α
h : Eq ↑s ↑t
⊢ Eq s t
decl:
@[ext]
protected theorem ext {s t : ClopenUpperSet α} (h : (s : Set α) = t) : s = t :=
  SetLike.ext' h

name: ClopenUpperSet.coe_mk
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s : TopologicalSpace.Clopens α
h : IsUpperSet s.carrier
⊢ Eq ↑{ toClopens := s, upper' := h } ↑s
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_mk (s : Clopens α) (h) : (mk s h : Set α) = s :=
  rfl

name: ClopenUpperSet.coe_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s t : ClopenUpperSet α
⊢ Eq (↑(Max.max s t)) (Union.union ↑s ↑t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_sup (s t : ClopenUpperSet α) : (↑(s ⊔ t) : Set α) = ↑s ∪ ↑t :=
  rfl

name: ClopenUpperSet.coe_inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
s t : ClopenUpperSet α
⊢ Eq (↑(Min.min s t)) (Inter.inter ↑s ↑t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_inf (s t : ClopenUpperSet α) : (↑(s ⊓ t) : Set α) = ↑s ∩ ↑t :=
  rfl

name: ClopenUpperSet.coe_top
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
⊢ Eq (↑Top.top) Set.univ
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_top : (↑(⊤ : ClopenUpperSet α) : Set α) = univ :=
  rfl

name: ClopenUpperSet.coe_bot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : LE α
⊢ Eq (↑Bot.bot) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_bot : (↑(⊥ : ClopenUpperSet α) : Set α) = ∅ :=
  rfl
